Name: CRAZY MAZE
About the game: CRAZY MAZE is an arcade game that is all about getting out of the maze filled with many traps that continuously disturb your gameplay. This apparently basic concept combined with various mechanics delivers many hours of intriguing and challenging gameplay. Clean design and matching soundtrack make the game even more enjoyable. You control the game using a mouse. FEATURES: Enjoyable gameplay Futuristic design and soundtrack 150+ Levels and more to come Various mechanics (e.g. deadly walls, falling floor, chasing virus and changing colors) Win with yourself and beat your own records Hardcore mode with modified versions of all arcade maps (for unstoppable players) Unlock new collections with different modes Lots of challenges and achievements New updates with new maps
